app.name: Wii64
app.long_description:
Wii64 Team is: Core Coder - tehpola Graphics & Menu Coding - sepp256 General Coding - emu_kidid
The Wii64Team proudly presents Wii64 Beta 1.1 'Honey' Wii64 is a port of Mupen64 to the Wii
It currently runs most games at full speed or close to it, there are some known graphical and/or core issues which are posted on http://emulatemii.com/wii64/CompatList/ If you like this project, please support us by donating towards our hardware fund at emulatemii.com Please see the enclosed README and visit emulatemii.com to report issues, or to check out the latest progress.
Special Thanks to: drmr - Graphics marshallh - Wii64 Demo ROM wiibrew - wiki & forums shagkur/WinterMute - libogc/devkitPPC Team Twiizers for Wii homebrew
Wii64 and the Wii64 logo are trademarks of the Wii64 Team and should not be used in unofficial builds.
